title: How does one get unbanned? Like Tyler1
body: A few years ago, My account was banned permanently for reasons that were never explained to me. I was wondering if there was a way to have this undone. Upon sifting through usernames, my account and info is still there. so it hasn't been removed. it would be as easy as unchecking the little box next to where it says "account restriction". Lets see what others have to say about the matter. Have you guys been very loyal players since season 1 and been permanently after logging in one morning?  RIP -ProLoLMaster- May your revival be swift!
